ADÉLA

Korean: 아델라

Hometown:

Birthday:

Age:
21 years old
Height:
5'7" (170 cm)

Introduction

ADÉLA is a Slovak singer-songwriter and dancer.

She is mostly known for her participation in HYBE x Geffen Records' survival show “The Debut: Dream Academy“, from which she was eliminated.

ADÉLA made her solo debut on September 13, 2024, with the release of the digital single "HOMEWRECKED".
